{
  "definitions": {},
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
  "$id": "http://example.com/root.json",
  "type": "object",
  "title": "The Root Schema",
  "required": [
    "code",
    "message",
    "videoMeta",
    "playAuth"
  ],
  "properties": {
    "code": {
      "$id": "#/properties/code",
      "type": "string",
      "title": "The Code Schema",
      "default": "",
      "examples": [
        "000000"
      ],
      "pattern": "^(.*)$"
    },
    "message": {
      "$id": "#/properties/message",
      "type": "string",
      "title": "The Message Schema",
      "default": "",
      "examples": [
        "成功"
      ],
      "pattern": "^(.*)$"
    },
    "videoMeta": {
      "$id": "#/properties/videoMeta",
      "type": "object",
      "title": "The Videometa Schema",
      "required": [
        "videoId",
        "title",
        "duration",
        "coverUrl",
        "status"
      ],
      "properties": {
        "videoId": {
          "$id": "#/properties/videoMeta/properties/videoId",
          "type": "string",
          "title": "The Videoid Schema",
          "default": "",
          "examples": [
            "5a6ca7c5576a4f9abdaff6d5ff28b105"
          ],
          "pattern": "^(.*)$"
        },
        "title": {
          "$id": "#/properties/videoMeta/properties/title",
          "type": "string",
          "title": "The Title Schema",
          "default": "",
          "examples": [
            "最炫民族风"
          ],
          "pattern": "^(.*)$"
        },
        "duration": {
          "$id": "#/properties/videoMeta/properties/duration",
          "type": "number",
          "title": "The Duration Schema",
          "default": 0.0,
          "examples": [
            276.33
          ]
        },
        "coverUrl": {
          "$id": "#/properties/videoMeta/properties/coverUrl",
          "type": "string",
          "title": "The Coverurl Schema",
          "default": "",
          "examples": [
            "http://uat-steam.opg.cn/_static/admin/images/resource/20180921100528_466341.png"
          ],
          "pattern": "^(.*)$"
        },
        "status": {
          "$id": "#/properties/videoMeta/properties/status",
          "type": "string",
          "title": "The Status Schema",
          "default": "",
          "examples": [
            "Normal"
          ],
          "pattern": "^(.*)$"
        }
      }
    },
    "playAuth": {
      "$id": "#/properties/playAuth",
      "type": "string",
      "title": "The Playauth Schema",
      "default": "",
      "examples": [
        ""
      ],
      "pattern": "^(.*)$"
    }
  }
}
